Welcome to My Website

My name is Kaixing Cao (Chinese characters: 曹凯星; pinyin: cáo kǎixīng).

I am currently a PhD student at the University of Milan. Here is my CV.

My research interests lie in arithmetic geometry; see Research page for more details.
